alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Eastern Roosevelt; McCone; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 9:17PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Daniels, central Roosevelt, Sheridan and northeastern McCone Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 917 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles west of Medicine Lake to 8 miles northwest of Poplar. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plentywood, Scobey, Poplar, Medicine Lake, Froid, Westby, Flaxville, Archer, Port Of Raymond, Port Of Whitetail, Madoc, Bredette, Port Of Scobey, Redstone, Whitetail, Outlook, Reserve, Raymond, Four Buttes and Comertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
